Header.title: Perfect Commerce Point
Header.paragraph: Here at Perfect Commerce Point we teach commerce subjects for class 11th and 12th.

About.paragraph: Perfect Commerce Point is the Name of Excellence from the last 32 years and a leading institute in the field of Commerce Education for the students who have opted Commerce as their career.
Why: Students who are interested in conceptual, in-depth studies for all the areas of subjects.
Students who are committed to do regular assignments and test- series.
Then, this is the right platform to chase your aspirations.

Features.title: Live Classes
Features.text: Join the live class sessions for online studies

Features.title: Assignments
Features.text: Complete assignments on time and get remarks

Features.title: Register Yourself
Features.text: Start right after you get registered

Features.title: Get E-Mail Notifications
Features.text: You will be notified through Mails for all the classes that are being scheduled
